page.title: 20BELLERBY_CHILDHOOD IN 1985
page.content: Life today is much better than in 1920.BMX bikes and computer games have taken the place of bowler hoops and whips & tops.School is also quite different though we still have to cross the yard to the toilet_the teachers do as well!!_and we have to trek round to the village hall for lunch.We do a lot of finding out for ourselves in lessons and we have a computer to help us as well as our teachers.At home most of us have a car,a T.V.,hi_fi and even video.In September we all move to a brand new school in Leyburn. {THESE 20 PAGES WERE COMPILED WITH THE {HELP OF THE FOLLOWING PEOPLE__ T.Gregg {J.Scott,C,Weatherill,D.Avison,A.Wild, {K.Metcalfe,T.Metcalfe,G.Thistlethwaite {C.Thurbin,S.Price,C.Scott,R.Weatherill {H.Pratt,B.Sayer,B.Avison(Secretary), {M.A.Ward and R.M.Akers(teachers)
